name: Stanleys-Trap
description: The loveable penguin Stanley was abducted! Aliens from a planet far far away have come and taken humanity prize hero.  Without Stanley, the world is vulnerable to invaders, It is up to you to free Stanley from The Grip of the Galactic Empire! Use his cunning skills and lasers to blast your way out of the prison maze of 100 floors! (Note I only have 3 floors finished.  A lot of the inspiration came from The Penguins of Madagascar and HP Lovecraft novels.)
